mapper.select: SELECT i.inventory_check_id, i.inventory_check_status, i.inventory_check_time, i.inventory_check_create_time, a.account_name AS inventory_check_operator, i.inventory_check_num, i.inventory_check_bid_money, i.inventory_check_sale_money, i.inventory_check_variety, i.inventory_check_remarks FROM inventory_check_table i LEFT JOIN account_table a ON i.inventory_check_operator_id = a.account_id WHERE i.inventory_check_tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND i.inventory_check_id = #{id}
